name: meet the Miggins
description:
Meet the Miggins!

  • control little creatures
  • grow your group of Miggins
  • see how big your family can get

Controls

  • click and/or drag to select units
  • right click to give selected units commands
  • right click on the big creature to buy more units

*Hover over something in-game for more in-depth, specific help*

Game-A-Month-Athon 

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where we've set out to create a bite-size experimental game each month! Meet the Miggins was created in October 2021 and will likely be expanded upon at a later date.

Support my work
